petition_for: Authorization to Administer Under Independent Administration of Estates Act

article_1.title: Taxes, Debts and Expenses of Administration
article_1.summary: Directs payment of all debts, funeral expenses, taxes, and administration costs as soon as practicable after death

article_2.title: Written Memorandum or Codicil
article_2.summary: Allows for written memorandum regarding tangible personal property disposition; 90-day deadline for Personal Representative to locate

article_3.title: Disposition of Residue and Pour Over Trust Provision
article_3.summary: Spouse receives memorabilia and pictures; Children receive stocks, bonds, jewelry, clothing, furniture, automobiles, boats in equal shares; All real and remaining personal property pours over to Judy Brakebill Jones 2008 Revocable Trust

article_4.title: Discharge of Lien
article_4.summary: Encumbered property passes subject to existing liens; estate not responsible for paying off mortgages

section_a.title: Personal Representatives
section_a.succession_rule: If one unable/unwilling to serve, other serves alone

article_8.title: Burial Instructions
article_8.instructions: Buried at Moss Landing Cemetery; NO cremation

article_10.title: Construction of Will and No Contest Clause
article_10.no_contest_consequence: Share revoked; disposed as if predeceased without issue

attachment_3g1d.claim_1: Eric Jones is named as Trustee of the Trust but has failed to move forward with the Trust administration
attachment_3g1d.claim_2: The beneficiaries have requested information from Eric Jones regarding the Trust since June 2025
attachment_3g1d.claim_3: Eric Jones has made false accusations against the beneficiaries
attachment_3g1d.conclusion: Therefore, he is unqualified to act as Co-Executor

attack_vectors_against_eric.strategic_intent: Exclude Eric as Co-Executor and appoint Heidi as sole Executor

persons_served.name: Shaymae Lababidi (Gretchen Angela Jones)
persons_served.address: 5 Hassan Sabry apt 3.2, C/O Lababidi, Zamalak, Cairo, Egypt

lost_will_presumption.issue: Probate Code Section 6124 creates rebuttable presumption that lost will was revoked
lost_will_presumption.petitioner_position: Presumption should not apply - see Declaration regarding Lost Will
lost_will_presumption.strategic_implication: If presumption applies, estate passes by intestacy, not will terms

co_executor_exclusion.issue: Will names Eric and Heidi as Co-Executors, but petition seeks to exclude Eric
co_executor_exclusion.basis_claimed: Eric 'unqualified' due to alleged failure to administer trust
co_executor_exclusion.strategic_implication: If granted, Heidi gains sole control over probate estate

trust_vs_probate_assets.issue: Will's pour-over provision directs assets to Trust, where Eric is Trustee
trust_vs_probate_assets.strategic_implication: Even if Heidi controls probate, Trust assets remain under Eric's control as Trustee

jurisdictional_conflict.potential_san_diego_pc850: PC850 Heggstad petition was being prepared

option_1.action: File objection to petition in Monterey County
basis: Eric named as Co-Executor in Will
Lost will presumption should not apply
Heidi's prior conduct disqualifies her (Nicora June 27 letter admissions)

option_2.action: File PC850 petition in appropriate venue
option_2.purpose: Confirm real property belongs to Trust via Heggstad doctrine
option_2.strategic_benefit: Establishes Trust control separate from probate

option_3.action: File cross-petition for removal of Heidi
option_3.basis: Unauthorized vehicle sale, false 'Co-Executor' claim, deposit into non-beneficiary account

option_4.action: Appear at January 7 hearing without prior filing
